promptLabel.description: The label for the item stem/prompt field

choicesLabel.description: The label for the section that allows an author to choose prefix labels for choices, using:`letters`, `numbers` or `none`

addChoiceButtonLabel.description: The label shown on the add choice button

enableSelectChoiceMode.description: Indicates whether author can modify the response type (radio / checkboxes) for single or multi-choice questions.

enableAddChoice.description: Whether config view will show a button that allows an author to add more choices

enableAddFeedBack.description: Show fields that allow author to edit content / messages that student role user would see if item is in evaluate mode

enablePartialScoring.description: Allow the author to modify settings for partial scoring

enableSelectChoiceLabels.description: Allow author to modify choice label options

enableConfigShuffle.description: allow author to control choice shuffling

enableShowPrompt.description: Determines whether author can show / hide prompt field

answerChoiceCount.description: Number of empty choices to show in config view if no choice model is provided
